definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: One end of a tube is gently inserted into the rectum.
sentences.chinese: 管的一头轻轻伸入直肠。

sentences.english: You only got to say she was blankly?
sentences.chinese: 照说这姑娘还真是直肠子。

sentences.english: This article reviewed the development and current status of neoadjuvant therapy for rectal cancer.
sentences.chinese: 本文详细论述了直肠癌新辅助治疗的发展和现状。

sentences.english: The method can be performed by someone inserting a hand in your rectum and gently massaging the prostate.
sentences.chinese: 操作方法是将手伸入直肠轻轻地按摩前列腺。

sentences.english: A comparison of laparoscopically assisted and open colectomy for colon cancer.
sentences.chinese: 腹腔镜手术治疗结直肠癌安全性的临床研究。

sentences.english: The wtra low resection is the major operative mode for low rectal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 超低位切除是低位直肠癌保肛手术主要术式。

sentences.english: You usually know what he is thinking, because he shoots from the hip.
sentences.chinese: 一般你能知道他在想什么，因为他是根直肠子。

sentences.english: Red meat will increase the incidence of colon and rectal cancer risk rate.
sentences.chinese: 红肉会增加结肠癌和直肠癌的发生危险率。

sentences.english: Fournier's gangrene is a rare but often fatal manifestation of rectal cancer.
sentences.chinese: 摘要福尼耳坏疽在直肠癌病患很少见却经常致命。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of partial excision of muscoli puborectalis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察耻骨直肠肌部分切除术的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Diagnosis and treatment of anorectal injuries.
sentences.chinese: 肛管直肠损伤的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the curative effects of anal sphincter preserving operation for ultra-low rectal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨超低位直肠癌保肛手术的治疗效果。

sentences.english: To explore traditional chinese and western medicine treatment methods anorectal prolapse.
sentences.chinese: 探讨中西医治疗肛管直肠脱垂的方法。

sentences.english: May be associated with proctitis and a variety of pathogenic microorganisms on the invasion of the intestinal tract.
sentences.chinese: 可能与直肠炎及多种病原微生物对肠道的侵袭有关。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of anorectal injuries.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肛管直肠损伤的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Colorectal cancer accounts for a large number of tumor-related deaths.
sentences.chinese: 结直肠癌占肿瘤相关性死亡的多数。
